channel.title: Mobile version
channel.description: Bring it back, please. And if it does still happen to exist, then add an option in the main tab that I can select so that I can view the site in mobile. One day the mobile version simply disappeared for me. I'm not sure if others had this issue, but in the past I could select "mobile" in the main tab (with home, profile, etc.); however, this option no longer seems to exist. The mobile version makes for much quicker browsing and posting from my iphone, which is what I use the majority of the time for casual internet browsing.

item.title: Mobile version
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

The one before was rather limited, but better then using classic. It was good for just browsing and light posting.
